ISSUE.TITLE: DateTime::createFromFormat is PHP 5.3+
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: [As reported](http://wordpress.org/support/topic/php-53x-datetimecreatefromformat?replies=1), looks like `DateTime::createFromFormat()` is PHP 5.3+ only. Drat.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #78 from WP-API/replace-hardcoded-pages-references Remove hardcoded /pages references. Fixes #28.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #79 from osiux/issue-52 Workaround for createFromFormat on PHP > 5.2 Fixes #52.
